projects.name: Next Meetly
projects.description: Meetly is an innovative video chat application that connects people worldwide effortlessly. Its user-friendly interface offers high-quality video and audio communication, creating a truly immersive experience. Beyond the basics, Meetly provides features like Participants History for easy reconnection, an Attendance Calculator for seamless tracking, and Record Meetings for convenient review and reference. The addition of a Reminders feature keeps users organized and on top of their schedules. Join the growing Meetly community, foster connections, collaborate effectively, and enjoy video chats like never before. Let Meetly bring you closer to the important people in your life.
bulletPoints: Developed a user-friendly interface using Next.js for high-quality video and audio communication, providing a truly immersive experience.
Implemented secure authentication and user management with NextAuth, ensuring privacy and security for all users.
Integrated WebRTC for real-time video and audio streaming, supporting multiple participants in a single video chat room.
Utilized Socket.io for real-time communication and event handling, enabling seamless interaction between users.
Designed a responsive and visually appealing UI with Tailwind CSS, ensuring a consistent user experience across various devices.
Managed state efficiently with Redux, enabling smooth and reliable performance of the application.
Built robust backend services and handled database interactions using Prisma, ensuring data integrity and optimal performance.

Introduced advanced features: Participants History for easy reconnection, Attendance Calculator for seamless tracking, Record Meetings for convenient review and reference, and Reminders to keep users organized and on top of their schedules.

projects.name: Next Amazon
projects.description: Amazon is an e-commerce website that contains list of products rendered from an external API where a logged in user can filter the products by either product type  or by price. Then choose products for purchasing by adding it to their basket, he has the option to add several items of different products or the same product  in which it affects the prices and quantities of the purchased items or to remove some or all the chosen items. Moreover, only the authenticated users can proceed  to checkout and pay using stripe checkout. Upon success, users can view their recent order and get notified about their successful payment via their email.
bulletPoints: E-commerce platform: Amazon-like website
Product listing: Rendered from an external API
User authentication: Only logged-in users can access certain features
Product filtering: Users can filter by product type or price
Add to basket: Users can add multiple items of different or the same product
Dynamic pricing: Quantities and prices adjust based on items in the basket
Basket management: Option to remove individual items or clear the entire basket
Checkout: Only authenticated users can proceed to checkout
Payment processing: Stripe Checkout integration for payments
Post-purchase features: Users can view recent orders
Notifications: Email notifications sent for successful payments

projects.name: Tesla Clone
projects.description: Tesla Clone is a design website that displays all car models in the home page and by choosing a specific car model, all details of the selected model like speed, hp and millage will be revealed.
bulletPoints: Design website: Tesla-like website clone
Car models display: All car models shown on the home page
Model selection: Users can choose a specific car model
Model details: Upon selection, detailed information is revealed, including:

projects.name: Next Spotify
projects.description: Spotify is a music application that contains some data taken from Spotify API where a logged in user that has a spotify account can access his recent playlist,  search by artist or song name and play the music.
bulletPoints: Music application: Spotify-like music streaming app
Data source: Some data taken from the Spotify API
User authentication: Only logged-in users with a Spotify account can access features
Recent playlists: Users can view and access their recent playlists
Search functionality: Users can search for music by artist or song name
Music playback: Users can play selected songs

projects.name: Next Instagram
projects.description: Next Instagram is a responsive website in which anyone can view a list of posts added by logged in users and in turn a user can add new posts by uploading a photo and adding a caption, react and comment to any available post.
bulletPoints: Responsive website: Next Instagram-like platform
Post listing: Anyone can view a list of posts added by logged-in users
User authentication: Only logged-in users can add new posts
New post creation: Users can upload photos and add captions
Post interaction: Users can react (like) and comment on any available post
Photo upload: Feature to upload a photo for each new post

projects.name: Icon Picker
projects.description: Icon Picker is an application that shows icons selected from an API with a data filtration where users can search for icons by name,price or style. Collecting an icon allows the user to choose different sizes and download it.
bulletPoints: Icon selection: Shows icons selected from an API
Data filtration: Users can search for icons by name, price, or style
Icon collection: Users can collect and choose different sizes for icons
Download option: Users can download selected icons

projects.name: Uberized
projects.description: Uberized is a website that shows locations on map chosen by logged in user between the current location and the one chosen. After signing in,  a link will be sent to the email to confirm the request and log you into the website. Then you can choose your favorite location and view it on map. You may check  some details between your current location and another by choosing a destination in the menu that in turn reveals some ride options with prices that can be paid online using PayPal checkout.
bulletPoints: Location map: Shows locations on a map chosen by the logged-in user
Current and chosen location: Displays a route between the current location and the chosen location
User authentication: Sign-in required to access features
Email confirmation: A link is sent to the email to confirm the request and log in
Favorite location: Users can choose and view their favorite location on the map
Destination selection: Users can choose a destination from a menu
Ride options: Reveals ride options with prices between current and chosen location
Payment: Online payment using PayPal Checkout

projects.name: Next LinkedIn
projects.description: LinkedIn Clone is a website that shows logged in users their own posts and can create new posts by uploading an image or a video. After submission, posts will be  listed according to their recent dates.
bulletPoints: User posts: Displays logged-in users' own posts
Post creation: Users can create new posts by uploading an image or video
Post listing: Posts are listed according to their most recent dates

projects.name: Next GoogleDocs
projects.description: GoogleDocs is an application where authenticated users can create a new blank document or edit previous documents in a text editor page.
bulletPoints: Authentication: Users must be authenticated to access features
Document creation: Users can create a new blank document
Document editing: Users can edit previous documents
Text editor: Provides a text editor page for creating and editing documents

projects.name: Next Disney
projects.description: Next Design is a website focusing on the design that contains a list of disney movies where logged in users can click a movie and a description page will be displayed.
bulletPoints: Design focus: Website centered around design
Disney movie list: Contains a list of Disney movies
User authentication: Only logged-in users can access movie details
Movie selection: Users can click on a movie from the list
Description page: Displays a description page for the selected movie

projects.name: React VideoChat
projects.description: React VideoChat is an application where a logged in user can start a meeting by creating a video chat room like google meet and send the room Id to anyone in order to join the room instance with the ability to enable or disable the camera and microphone. The user that was invited to join has also to sign in then join a meeting  by entering the room Id. If both users are muted, they can communicate using a chat palette. Any user in the meeting can present and share his screen with other users.
bulletPoints: Video chat room: Users can start a meeting by creating a video chat room (similar to Google Meet)
Room ID: Users can send the room ID to others to join the meeting
Camera and microphone control: Users can enable or disable their camera and microphone
User authentication: Invited users must sign in before joining the meeting
Join meeting: Users enter the room ID to join the meeting
Text chat: If both users are muted, they can communicate using a chat palette
Screen sharing: Any user in the meeting can present and share their screen with others

projects.name: React Amazon
projects.description: Amazon is an e-commerce website that contains list of products rendered from an external API where a user can register using a register form then sign in using his credentials. Then choose products for purchasing by adding it to their basket, he has the option to add several items of different products or the same product  and to remove some or all the chosen items. Moreover, only the authenticated users can proceed to checkout and pay using stripe card number.
bulletPoints: E-commerce platform: Amazon-like website
Product listing: Products rendered from an external API
User registration: Users can register using a registration form
User sign-in: Users can sign in using their credentials
Basket management: Users can add products to their basket
Product options: Users can add multiple items of different or the same product
Item removal: Option to remove some or all chosen items from the basket
Checkout: Only authenticated users can proceed to checkout
Payment processing: Payments made using Stripe card number

projects.name: React FoodApp
projects.description: React FoodApp is an application that displays food categories and show their description. Once a user choose a specific category, a new page will open showing  all items related to the chosen category with the option to read each item ingredients and instruction, also to watch a related video. A user can subscribe by adding his email.
bulletPoints: Food categories: Displays different food categories with descriptions
Category selection: Users can choose a specific category
Category details: Opens a new page showing all items related to the chosen category
Item details: Option to read ingredients and instructions for each item
Related video: Option to watch a video related to each item
Subscription: Users can subscribe by adding their email

projects.name: React Google
projects.description: React Google is a search engine website where users can search for data in the search input in which only ten listed results will be displayed.
bulletPoints: Search engine: React-based search engine website
Search input: Users can enter queries into a search input field
Search results: Only ten results are displayed per search

projects.name: React Facebook
projects.description: React Facebook is a website where logged in users can create a new post, add a caption and upload an image. Also, can view all other user's posts listed in descending time order.
bulletPoints: User authentication: Logged-in users can access features
Post creation: Users can create new posts
Caption and image: Add a caption and upload an image with each post
Post feed: View all other users' posts listed in descending time order

projects.name: React Netflix
projects.description: React Netflix is a website where logged users can enter their email address and get started. Whether they have an account, the email will be automatically filled to enter the password and sign in or the user has to sign in with new email address. After that, the user has to select a plan for subscription in order to be successfully viewing all movies and categories.
bulletPoints: User authentication: Logged-in users can enter their email address to get started
Automatic email filling: For existing accounts, the email is automatically filled for sign-in
Sign-in options: Users can either sign in with an existing email or use a new email address
Subscription plan: Users must select a subscription plan to access all movies and categories

projects.name: React QuizApp
projects.description: React QuizApp is an application where a user can choose any category and start a quiz of ten questions. If no chosen category, a random quiz will be taken. After  submitting all the answers, the score will be displayed.
bulletPoints: Category selection: Users can choose a specific category for the quiz
Random quiz: If no category is chosen, a random quiz will be provided
Quiz format: Each quiz consists of ten questions
Score display: The score is displayed after submitting all answers

projects.name: React Corona
projects.description: React Corona is an application that displays and tracks corona cases worldwide with an overview of country cases starting from the largest numbers. It shows the  number of all the cases, recovered and deaths. Also it displays via a graph the cases for the previous week from the fetched date with exact values for each week day. A user can choose a specific country to check only its cases.
bulletPoints: Worldwide tracking: Displays and tracks corona cases globally
Country overview: Shows cases starting from the largest numbers
Case details: Displays the total number of cases, recoveries, and deaths
Weekly graph: Shows a graph of cases for the previous week with exact values for each weekday
Country selection: Users can choose a specific country to view its cases

projects.name: Node quote
projects.description: Node Quote is a website where logged in users can create a new quote by filling a form and selecting the type of the quote appearance. Once it is public, the quote will be displayed in both the dashboard and the quotes section, so all other users can only view it in the dashboard section without being able to edit or delete  any of the quotes. Otherwise, the quote will be only listed in the quotes section specifically for the logged in user, in which he can edit or delete his own quotes  in both the qoutes and dashboard section.
bulletPoints: User authentication: Logged-in users can access quote features
Quote creation: Users can create a new quote by filling out a form and selecting the quote's appearance type
Public quotes: Public quotes are displayed in both the dashboard and the quotes section
Viewing permissions: Other users can only view public quotes in the dashboard section without editing or deleting them
Private quotes: Private quotes are listed only in the quotes section specific to the logged-in user
Quote management: Users can edit or delete their own quotes in both the quotes and dashboard sections
